organizations: Olgun Uluc FOX SPORTS Nick Kyrgios
title: Dangerfield’s perfect stoush with Kyrgios
text:
Adelaide Crows star Tex Walker calls tennis bad-boy Nick Kyrgios a ‘dead set flog’ in Twitter rant Olgun Uluc FOX SPORTS Adelaide Crows star Tex Walker calls tennis bad-boy Nick Kyrgios a ‘dead set flog’ in Twitter rant Olgun Uluc FOX SPORTS Nick Kyrgios cops second warning 0:58 
Tennis: Nick Kyrgios has received another warning for unsportsmanlike conduct in his loss to Japan's Kei Nishikori at the Shanghai Masters. October 14th 2015 16 hours ago /video/video.news.com.au/Sport/Tennis/ NICK Kyrgios has fired back at Taylor Walker after the Adelaide skipper called the Aussie firebrand a “dead set flog” on Twitter. Walker unleashed an incredible attack early on Wednesday calling Kyrgios a “flog”, “peanut” and “galoot”. Kyrgios had just been slapped with a $2062 fine for audible obscenity at the Shanghai Masters, leading to Walker’s harsh words about the tennis bad-boy. When is this absolute Galoot going to learn. What a dead set flog!! Just suspend the peanut!! http://t.co/rULDU8SPPz
